about_the_game:
Double the storage capacity of the "Passwords" section with the Online Adult Content Manager - Passwords Links Extension DLC!

This DLC adds an extra 5 pages to the "Passwords" section, doubling the capacity from 100 links to 200 links!

content_descriptors.notes: The base Online Adult Content Manager is intended for an adult purpose and audience.

detailed_description:
Double the storage capacity of the "Passwords" section with the Online Adult Content Manager - Passwords Links Extension DLC!

This DLC adds an extra 5 pages to the "Passwords" section, doubling the capacity from 100 links to 200 links!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Will more than likely work on requirements less than this.
